TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool GlyphOriginDelegate(Font font, object fontData, uint glyph, out int x, out int y);
.class public auto ansi sealed GlyphOriginDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The user-specified font data associated with the font.
When this method returns, contains the X coordinate of the glyph origin in font units.
When this method returns, contains the Y coordinate of the glyph origin in font units.
Docs.summary: A callback delegate used to retrieve the origin coordinates of a glyph for horizontal or vertical layout.
Docs.returns: if the origin was found; otherwise, .
